common.locationOutsideGeorgia: Please select a location within Georgia. Delivery is only available in Georgia.

hero.title: Create Your Online Store in Minutes

featuredStores.title: Successful Stores
featuredStores.subtitle: Check out the stores created by our users
featuredStores.emptyState: Featured stores will appear here soon

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Just 3 simple steps to open your store

step1.title: Create Your Brand
step1.description: Choose your store name, upload logo and cover, pick your brand color

step2.title: Add Categories
step2.description: Create categories and subcategories to organize your products

step3.title: Add Products
step3.description: Upload products with photos, descriptions, and prices

paymentMethods.title: Receive Payments Securely
paymentMethods.subtitle: Accept payments from any Georgian bank or PayPal

footer.description: ShopIt - A platform where anyone can create their own online store

metadata.title: ShopIt - Create Your Online Store
metadata.description: Create a professional online store for free and start selling today. Simple, fast, and effective.

register.step1Description: Choose your store name, brand color, and optionally upload a logo
register.useInitialAsLogo: Use colored initial as brand logo
register.logoWarning: Having a brand logo can increase brand popularity and success.
register.logoFormatHint: For best results, use PNG or SVG with transparent background
register.mobileCtaText: Sign up to create your personal shop website.
register.step2Description: Tell visitors what makes your store special
register.enterDescription: Describe your store and what you sell...
register.enterAuthorName: Enter your name or business name
register.authorVisibilityNote: Even if hidden, your name is required for administrative purposes
register.defaultCoverWarning: A custom cover image that matches your brand can make your store stand out and attract more customers.
register.coverFormatHint: Recommended: JPG or PNG, 1200×400px or wider for best results
register.step3Description: Create your account to launch your store
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
register.registerAsLoggedInUser: You're logged in! Click below to create your store.
register.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already registered. Please use a different email or login.
register.profileCompletionFailed: Failed to complete profile. Please try again.
register.profileCompletionDescription: We need a few more details to help you get paid and for our team to contact you if needed.
register.whyWeNeedThis: Why do we need this information?
register.whyWeNeedThisDescription: We require your personal and banking information to process payments securely and comply with Georgian regulations.
register.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid Georgian phone number (e.g., 555123456 or +995555123456)
register.ibanInvalid: Please enter a valid Georgian IBAN (GE + 20 characters)
register.securityNote: Your information is encrypted and stored securely

dashboard.allMyOrdersDescription: View all your orders from all shops in one place.
dashboard.myWishlistDescription: Products you've saved from all shops.
dashboard.noOrdersDescription: Your orders from all shops will appear here.
dashboard.noWishlistItemsDescription: Save products you love and they'll appear here.
dashboard.addressesDescription: Manage your saved shipping addresses for faster checkout.
dashboard.noAddressesDescription: Add your first address for faster checkout.
dashboard.label: Label
dashboard.devicesDescription: Manage devices that are logged into your account.
dashboard.revokeAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out all other devices?
dashboard.noDevicesDescription: Your active sessions will appear here.
dashboard.balanceDescription: Track your earnings and request withdrawals.
dashboard.analyticsDescription: Track your performance and earnings over time.
dashboard.courierOverviewDescription: Here's your delivery overview for today.
dashboard.profileDescription: Manage your personal and banking information.
dashboard.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
dashboard.workingAreasHint: Enter the cities or regions where you can make deliveries.
dashboard.dangerZoneDescription: These actions are irreversible. Please be careful.
dashboard.deleteStoreConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your store? All products, orders, and store data will be permanently deleted. Your user account will be kept.
dashboard.removeCourierConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove your courier account? You will no longer be able to deliver orders.
dashboard.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.courierHandlingDelivery: A courier is handling this delivery. Status changes are managed by the courier.
dashboard.confirmShippingSize: Confirm this vehicle type for delivery
dashboard.setupRequiredDescription: Complete these steps to publish your website:
dashboard.publishModalWarning: Once published, this action cannot be reverted. Please make sure everything looks good before proceeding.
dashboard.publishModalMessageHint: This message is private and will only be visible to our team. Share your story or any special notes!
dashboard.publishModalDeleteNote: You can delete your store anytime. If you need to temporarily disable it without losing data, please contact us.
dashboard.publishRequestSent: Your publish request has been submitted! We'll review it shortly.
dashboard.readyToPublishDescription: All required fields are complete. You can now publish your website.
dashboard.gettingStartedDescription: Complete these steps to set up your store and start selling.
dashboard.step1Description: Add your personal and banking information
dashboard.step2Description: Create a product listing to start selling
dashboard.step3Description: Share your store link with customers
dashboard.createNewProduct: Create a new product for your store
dashboard.productImagesDescription: Add up to 10 images. The first image will be the main product image.
dashboard.shippingDimensionsDescription: Select the shipping size category for delivery cost calculation
dashboard.shippingSizeInfo: Choose the category that best fits your product
dashboard.shippingSizeSmallDesc: Courier on bike/motorcycle. Examples: jewelry, phone cases, small cosmetics
dashboard.shippingSizeMediumDesc: Courier in car. Examples: shoes, bags, small electronics, books
dashboard.shippingSizeLargeDesc: Courier in SUV. Examples: TVs, small furniture, large boxes
dashboard.shippingSizeExtraLargeDesc: Courier in van/truck. Examples: sofas, refrigerators, mattresses
dashboard.deleteProductConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.productVisible: This product is visible to customers
dashboard.productHidden: This product is hidden from your store
dashboard.noProductsDescription: Start by adding your first product to your store. You can add images, set prices, and manage inventory.
dashboard.manageAttributes: Manage product attributes like size, color, material.
dashboard.noAttributesDescription: Create attributes to add variations to your products. Examples: Size, Color, Material.
dashboard.requiresImage: Requires separate image for each value
dashboard.requiresImageDescription: Enable this if products with this attribute need different images per value (e.g., different colors).
dashboard.clickToAdd: Click a color to add it
dashboard.deleteAttributeConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this attribute? Products using this attribute may be affected.
dashboard.deleteValueConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this value?
dashboard.variantsDescription: Create product variations by selecting attributes and their values. Each combination becomes a variant with its own stock.
dashboard.enableVariantsDescription: Turn on to sell this product with different options (e.g., sizes, colors)
dashboard.selectAttributesDescription: Choose which attributes apply to this product
dashboard.selectValuesDescription: Choose which values of this attribute are available
dashboard.variantImagesDescription: Upload images for each variant group. Images are required for attributes marked as 'requires image'.
dashboard.variantImageRequired: This variant group requires at least one image
dashboard.imagesOptionalOutOfStock: Images are optional for out-of-stock variants
dashboard.noVariantsDescription: Select attributes and values above, then click Generate Variants to create all combinations.
dashboard.configureVariantStock: Set stock quantity for each variant
dashboard.noAttributesForVariants: No attributes available. Create attributes first to use variants.
dashboard.hideAddressNote: Your address is still required for courier pickup, but won't be shown on your public store page.
dashboard.shippingSettingsDescription: Configure how your products will be delivered to customers.
dashboard.shopitDeliveryDescription: Let ShopIt couriers handle delivery. We pick up from your location and deliver to customers.
dashboard.selfDeliveryDescription: Handle deliveries yourself or use your own courier service. You set the delivery fee and time.
dashboard.preparationTimeDescription: How long you need to prepare items for shipping after an order is placed.
dashboard.noPrepRequired: No preparation needed (items can ship same day)
dashboard.deliveryTimeDescription: How long it takes to deliver after items are prepared.
dashboard.selfDeliveryNote: With self-delivery, you handle shipping yourself. Customers will see your estimated delivery time and fee during checkout. ShopIt only takes the standard 10% commission on product sales.
dashboard.selfPickupDescription: Let customers pick up orders from your store. Shipping is free for self-pickup orders. Make sure your store address is set correctly.
dashboard.failedToLoadDashboard: Failed to load dashboard data. Please try again.
dashboard.courierApplicationPendingDescription: Your courier application is being reviewed. We'll notify you once a decision has been made.

auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

store.noProductsDescription: Check back soon for new arrivals!
store.noWishlistItemsDescription: Save products you like to your wishlist
store.loginRequiredWishlistDescription: Please login to view your wishlist
store.storeNotFoundDescription: The store "{storeName}" doesn't exist or hasn't been set up yet.

store.createYourStore: Want to create your own online store?

balance.title: Balance & Earnings
balance.waitingEarningsTooltip: Earnings from paid orders awaiting delivery
balance.withdrawNote: Withdrawal requests are processed within 1-3 business days. Funds will be transferred to your registered bank account.

orders.title: My Orders
orders.loginRequiredDescription: Please login to view your orders
orders.noOrdersDescription: When you purchase products, your orders will appear here
orders.awaitingPaymentDescription: Complete your payment in the new window. This page will update automatically.
orders.paymentWindowOpen: Payment window is open in another tab
orders.paymentSuccessfulDescription: Your payment has been received. Refreshing your orders...
orders.paymentFailedDescription: The payment could not be completed. You can try again.
orders.paymentWindowClosedDescription: The payment window was closed. You can try again from your orders page.
orders.onlyCancelledOrders: You only have cancelled orders. Enable the checkbox above to view them.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.emptyCartDescription: Add products to your cart to proceed with checkout
checkout.locationRequiredWarning: Please select a location on the map to calculate shipping
checkout.locationRequiredError: Please select your delivery location on the map before proceeding
checkout.homeDeliveryDescription: We'll deliver your order to your address
checkout.selfPickupDescription: Pick up your order from the store address
checkout.successDescription: Thank you for your order. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
checkout.failDescription: Unfortunately, your payment could not be processed. Please try again.
checkout.awaitingPaymentDescription: Complete your payment in the new window. This page will update automatically.
checkout.paymentWindowOpen: Payment window is open in another tab
checkout.paymentSuccessfulDescription: Your payment has been received. Redirecting to your orders...
checkout.paymentFailedDescription: The payment could not be completed. You can try again.
checkout.paymentWindowClosedDescription: The payment window was closed. You can try again from your orders page.

courier.heroDescription: Join our courier network and earn money delivering products from local stores. Flexible hours, competitive pay, and instant payouts.
courier.step1Description: Register on our platform, submit your information, and get approved to start delivering.
courier.step2Description: Browse available delivery orders from stores across the city. Pick the ones that fit your schedule.
courier.step3Description: Complete deliveries and earn money. Withdraw your earnings anytime to your bank account.
courier.benefitsDescription: Join hundreds of couriers already earning with ShopIt
courier.flexibleHoursDesc: Work when you want. No minimum hours, no fixed schedule.
courier.competitivePayDesc: Earn up to ₾50+ per day with our delivery fees.
courier.easyAppDesc: Manage orders, track earnings, and navigate with our intuitive dashboard.
courier.useYourVehicleDesc: Car, motorcycle, bicycle, or even walking - deliver your way.
courier.trackEarningsDesc: Real-time analytics show your daily, weekly, and monthly earnings.
courier.weeklyPayoutsDesc: Withdraw your earnings anytime. Money in your account within 24 hours.
courier.ctaDescription: Join our courier network today and start delivering tomorrow.
courier.noAvailableOrders: No available orders at the moment
courier.noAvailableOrdersDesc: Check back later for new delivery opportunities
courier.cannotCarry: Your vehicle cannot carry this order
courier.applyDescription: Fill out the form below to apply. We'll review your application and get back to you within 24-48 hours.
courier.profilePhotoDescription: Upload a clear photo of yourself. This will be shown to customers when you're delivering their orders.
courier.bankDetailsDescription: Enter your Georgian IBAN where you'll receive your earnings.
courier.motivationDescription: Share why you want to become a ShopIt courier and any relevant experience you have.
courier.motivationPlaceholder: I want to become a ShopIt courier because...
courier.applicationFailed: Failed to submit application. Please try again.
courier.alreadyCourierDescription: You've already been approved as a courier. Go to your dashboard to start delivering.
courier.applicationSubmittedDescription: Thank you for applying! We'll review your application and get back to you within 24-48 hours. You'll receive an email notification once approved.
courier.applicationPendingDescription: Your courier application is currently being reviewed. We'll notify you once a decision has been made. This usually takes 24-48 hours.
courier.loginToApplyDescription: Please login or create an account to apply as a courier.
courier.vehicleTypeDescription: Select the type of vehicle you'll use for deliveries. Larger vehicles can handle bigger items.
courier.vehicleTypeNote: Smaller carriers (walking, bicycle, motorcycle) can handle up to 5 small items. Cars can handle unlimited small items and up to 3 medium items. SUVs add up to 2 large items. Vans can handle up to 2 extra-large items plus unlimited smaller ones.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with important alerts and updates
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: You're all caught up! New notifications will appear here.
notifications.minutesAgo: {count, plural, one {# minute ago} other {# minutes ago}}

notifications.settingsDescription: Choose how and when you want to be notified
notifications.preference_off_description: Don't receive any notifications for this channel
notifications.preference_important_description: Only receive critical notifications like account updates, order status, etc.
notifications.preference_all_description: Receive all notifications including promotional content
notifications.emailNotImplemented: Email notifications are coming soon. Your preference will be saved for when this feature is available.
notifications.pushNotImplemented: Push notifications are coming soon. Your preference will be saved for when this feature is available.
notifications.importantNotificationsDescription: Account updates, order status changes, courier approval status, security alerts
notifications.promoNotificationsDescription: New features, special offers, marketing updates, newsletters

admin.aboutManagementDescription: Edit the About Us page content

admin.contactSubmissionsDescription: View messages from the contact form

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start selling for free. No hidden fees, no monthly charges.
pricing.noHiddenFees: No setup fees, no monthly fees, no hidden costs
pricing.commissionDescription: We only charge a {percent}% commission on each sale. This covers payment processing, hosting, and all platform features. You keep the rest!
pricing.questionsDescription: Check out our FAQ for more details about pricing and features.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ShopIt
faq.contactUs: Our team is here to help you with any questions you may have.

about.title: About ShopIt
about.subtitle: Empowering entrepreneurs to build their online presence
about.missionDefault: We believe everyone should have the opportunity to sell online. ShopIt makes it easy for anyone to create a professional online store in minutes, without any technical skills or upfront costs.
about.storyDefault: ShopIt was born from a simple idea: make e-commerce accessible to everyone. We've built a platform that removes the barriers to online selling, allowing entrepreneurs to focus on what they do best - creating amazing products and serving their customers.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: We make complex things simple. Create your store in minutes, not days.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: No hidden fees, no surprises. You always know what you're paying.

support.title: Support
support.description: We're here for you. Our team is always ready to help you succeed.

about.ctaDescription: Join thousands of sellers who trust ShopIt for their online business.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with our team.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

general.title: 1. General Terms
general.content: By using ShopIt, you agree to these terms of service. ShopIt provides an e-commerce platform that allows sellers to create online stores, buyers to purchase products, and couriers to deliver orders.

sellers.title: 2. Seller Terms
sellers.content: As a seller, you agree to provide accurate product information, fulfill orders promptly, and comply with all applicable laws. ShopIt charges a {commissionPercent}% commission on each sale, which is deducted from your earnings.

buyers.title: 3. Buyer Terms
buyers.content: As a buyer, you agree to provide accurate delivery information and complete payment for orders. Product quality and descriptions are the responsibility of individual sellers.

couriers.title: 4. Courier Terms
couriers.content: As a courier, you agree to deliver orders safely and on time. Couriers receive {courierPercent}% of the delivery fee for each completed delivery.

payments.title: 5. Payments
payments.content: All payments are processed securely through our payment partners. Sellers can withdraw their earnings once the minimum withdrawal amount of {minWithdrawal} GEL is reached.

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.content: ShopIt acts as a platform connecting buyers, sellers, and couriers. We are not responsible for the quality of products, delivery issues between parties, or disputes arising from transactions.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of any changes.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including your name, email, phone number, delivery addresses, and payment information. We also collect information about your use of our platform.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, send communications, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share your information with sellers to fulfill orders, couriers to deliver products, and payment processors to complete transactions. We do not sell your personal information.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and personalize content.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at support@shopit.ge.
